task.title: Joining a moderated meeting
task.shortdesc: This type of meeting limits control to the owner or designated moderators. By default, guests can join an existing meeting. Unless Moderated is enabled, any authenticated user can start the meeting. Otherwise, the meeting owner or moderator must start the meeting first before other users can join. For more information on how to create and manage your meetings, refer to and . If the meeting has started and waiting room is enabled, then participants must be admitted into the meeting first before being able to select Join from the preview window.

taskbody.prereq: You must secure the meeting link or name in order to join or access the meeting. The meeting link is in the following format.https://meetings.customname.com/meeting/thisisjustatest

context.p: If you need presenter or moderator rights, ask the moderator for assistance. For lecture-style meetings, you must be a panelist in order to speak and participate in the conversation. For more information, refer to . allows you to use all the in-meeting features.

step.cmd: In a web browser, go to the meeting link.
step.info: Follow the instructions on how to configure and allow browser access to your audio output, microphone, and camera.

info.note: Toggling your camera and microphone on and off affect those devices when joining.

ul.li: Select Login and sign into your account. For more information, refer to .

step.info: For security reasons, Sametime requires all users to sign in as a guest or authenticated user before joining.

info.note: Some meetings require a password. Contact the moderator for the details.

step.cmd: Adjust your audio and video settings. Depending on the access level and how the meeting is configured, you are either redirected to the waiting room or admitted to the meeting after joining. For more information, refer to . If you are unable to join a meeting, contact the moderator for assistance.

task.title: Joining a moderated meeting from the Meetings homepage

context.p: You can also join a moderated meeting from the Meetings homepage. Simply follow these steps:

step.cmd: In a web browser, go to the Meetings homepage.

ul.li: Sign in to your account. For more information, refer to .
Select Join as a guest. Enter your display name, and then select Join as a guest.

info.note: For security reasons, Sametime requires all users to sign in before joining.

step.cmd: From the Meetings homepage, select Get Started > Join an existing meeting.
Enter the meeting name. Some meetings require a password. Contact the moderator for the details.

step.info: Follow the instructions on how to configure and allow browser access to your audio output, microphone, and camera.
